description: Try our easy to follow Falafels With Tabouli recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Falafels With Tabouli Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place chickpeas, onion, garlic, egg and parsley in a food processor and pulse until finely ground and well combined. Transfer to a bowl. Add flour, cumin, coriander and cayenne. Season. Stir until combined.
With wet hands, roll heaped tablespoons of mixture into balls and place on a tray. Chill for 30 minutes.

Line a large baking tray with paper towel. Place a wire rack over tray. Half-fill a medium saucepan with oil and place over medium heat. Cook falafels in batches, for 5 minutes or until golden. Transfer to prepared tray. Serve with tabouli, hummus, pita bread and lemon slices.
